    • Constructor Detail

      • Edge

        public Edge(int start,
            int end)
        Creates a new edge that connects the two given vertices. This defines the orientation of the edge
        Parameters:
        start - the index in vertexTable of the starting vertex
        end - the index in vertexTable of the ending vertex

    • Method Detail

      • addFace

        public void addFace(MeshData.Face f,
                    MeshData.Edge e1,
                    MeshData.Edge e2)
        Adds a new face and the two edges belonging both to the face an this edge
        Parameters:
        f - face that belongs to this edge
        e1 - edge that connects the given face with this edge's first vertex
        e2 - edge that connects the given face with this edge's second vertex
